DOC.brief_title: Significance Fluorescence Colposcopy With Autofluorescence Imaging Cervical Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Perform pelvic vaginal exam subjective know symptom , illness history , physical exam basal state fluorescence colposcopy . 2 . Observe acetowhite epithelium perform biopsy suspicious lesion fluorescence colposcopy . 3 . Perform fluorescence colposcopy biopsy confirm extraordinary reaction . 4 . After 1~2weeks follow subjective opd confirm biopsy result .
DOC.criteria: 1. age : 2065 year 2. abnormal cervical papanicolaou smear , specific cervical disease 3. subject colposcopic biopsy LEEP 4. sign voluntarily inform concents full knowledge explanation abot objective , method , content 1. pregnant woman 2. porphyria 3. severe cervical bleeding 4. genital chlamydia , gonorrhea infection 5. drug user possible interaction ( e.g . photosensitizer ) 6. informed consent
